  <div class="trends-inner"><div class="flex-module trends-container context-trends-container">
  <div class="flex-module-header">
    
    <h3><span class="trend-location js-trend-location">Worldwide trends</span></h3>
  </div>
  <div class="flex-module-inner">

      <li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="857608627472957440" id="stream-item-tweet-857608627472957440" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;857608627472957440&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Heather Wheeler MP Retweeted Tony Roe</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Absolutely delighted for Amanda, finishing the Ldn Marathon today, in a good time. </div>

      <li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="848171729755176961" id="stream-item-tweet-848171729755176961" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;848171729755176961&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       has-cards  has-content&#10;" data-tweet-id="836960316756004864" data-item-id="836960316756004864" data-permalink-path="/indparltrust/status/836960316756004864" data-conversation-id="836960316756004864" data-tweet-nonce="836960316756004864-0fadd8db-22ba-4db6-9973-45e6dd60f15a" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="836965338432606209" data-retweeter="ASollowayUK" data-screen-name="indparltrust" data-name="IPT" data-user-id="34048384" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="TidewayLondon" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;34048384&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;indparltrust&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;IPT&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;IPT&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;IPT&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;4439444062&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;ASollowayUK&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Amanda Solloway&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Amanda Solloway&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Amanda Solloway&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;82884348&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;TidewayLondon&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Tideway&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Tideway&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Tideway&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-has-cards="true">

        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>

  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Inspiring afternoon at <a href="/DerbyUni" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="39975307"><s>@</s><b>DerbyUni</b></a> with city leaders from different sectors working at developing Derby together, thanks @ASollowayMP <a href="/hashtag/Derby?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Derby</b></a></p>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Like</span>
    </div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Camera in situ following its discovery in our "private" meeting room following Sports Direct warehouse tour. Absolutely unbelievable...<a href="https://t.co/2k8UexnW6n" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/2k8UexnW6n</a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Delighted to be at <a href="/NCAapp" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="4764966135"><s>@</s><b>NCAapp</b></a> launch this afternoon with <a href="/MrNickKnowles" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="102787150"><s>@</s><b>MrNickKnowles</b></a> <a href="/HodgkinsonBuild" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="156994571"><s>@</s><b>HodgkinsonBuild</b></a> @ASollowayMP <a href="/3aaaUK" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="862917619"><s>@</s><b>3aaaUK</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/construction?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>construction</b></a></p>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>
  </span>

  </button>

  </h3>
  <p class="UIWalkthrough-message">This timeline is where youll spend most of your time, getting instant updates about what matters to you.</p>

  </p>
